name: showmoreshowless
description: Displays long text with a 'Show more / Show less' option for Mendix Native apps. Includes smooth animation, ellipsis truncation and full styling flexibility via class names.
author: Sjors Schultz

scripts.dev: pluggable-widgets-tools start:server --watch && if exist dist\1.0.0\bluealpaca.ShowMoreShowLess.mpk (copy /Y dist\1,0,0\bluealpaca.ShowMoreShowLess.mpk "C:\MxProjects\WidgetDevelopment\showMoreShowLess\test\widgets\bluealpaca.ShowMoreShowLess.mpk") else (echo MPK not found in dist folder!)
scripts.build: pluggable-widgets-tools build:native && if exist dist\1.0.0\bluealpaca.ShowMoreShowLess.mpk (copy /Y dist\1.0.0\bluealpaca.ShowMoreShowLess.mpk "C:\MxProjects\WidgetDevelopment\showMoreShowLess\test\widgets\bluealpaca.ShowMoreShowLess.mpk") else (echo MPK not found in dist folder!)
